meanings.definition: A small computer on a single integrated circuit.
meanings.sent1: The microcontroller controls the temperature in the room.
meanings.sent2: I programmed the microcontroller to turn on the lights at sunset.
meanings.sent3: The microcontroller decided it was too cold and turned up the heat.
meanings.sent4: Like a tiny brain, the microcontroller processes information and makes decisions.
meanings.sent5: The microcontroller hummed softly as it worked tirelessly to regulate the airflow.

meanings.definition: A device that contains a processor, memory, and input/output peripherals on a single chip.
meanings.sent1: The microcontroller in the robot coordinates its movements.
meanings.sent2: We installed a new microcontroller to improve the performance of the device.
meanings.sent3: The microcontroller beeped happily when the task was completed.
meanings.sent4: The microcontroller acts as the brain of the electronic system, controlling all functions.
meanings.sent5: With precision and speed, the microcontroller managed multiple tasks simultaneously.
